---
pagetitle: "SWINNO"
---

:::{.text-bigger}
The SWINNO project does research at the forefront of innovation and innovation systems.
We developed and maintain a unique database of Swedish innovation from 1889 to today.
Currently we focus on the impact of innovations as well as social, environmental and economic sustainability.
:::
